doc.name: ColorAttribute
doc.description: This is an attribute that specifies a color. The value of this attribute is an array of four doubles in the form {red, green, blue, alpha}, where each number is the range of 0.0 to 1.0. The 'alpha' term represents opacity, where 1.0 is opaque, and 0.0 is fully transparent (invisible).
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
